ygData.subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] Monk Quests
ygData.msgSnippet: can anyone confirm this. i remember seeing on the net somewhere that if you kill Dorn (in north ro, not sure which surname) a Dark elf assassin spawns, if you
ygData.messageBody:
RE: [EQ-Monks] Monk Quests

can anyone confirm this.

i remember seeing on the net somewhere that if you kill Dorn (in north ro, not sure which surname) a Dark elf assassin spawns, if you kill him a Widow mite spawns and if you kill that it drops the Iskar monk initiation book (or note) the one they start with and give to their guild master. according to this web page a human monk could use the scroll to join the iskar monk guild and thus gain access to the shackle quests...

has anyone ever seen or heard anything like this elsewhere ???

-----Original Message-----
From: William Marini [mailto:wmarini@...]
Sent: 25 January 2001 12:24
To: EQ-Monks@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] Monk Quests


Iksar or Human?, it makes a difference.

-----Original Message-----
From: Aazen1@... [mailto:Aazen1@...]
Sent: Wednesday, January 24, 2001 9:45 PM
To: EQ-Monks@egroups.com
Subject: [EQ-Monks] Monk Quests


Hello my brother and sister Monks,
I was wondering if you guys wouldn't mind recommending any Monk specific
quests that you find worth doing? Just wondering.

Thanks!
Casper
